archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.3a: a) define the scope of each risk assessment (i.e. the business environment, process or application; and supporting technical systems/networks that are subject to risk assessment)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
